mapper.insert: insert into recordbooks_value(bookno,userno,bookcolumnno) select (select bookno from recordbooks where booknm=#{bookNm}) as bookno, "userNo" as userno, #{columnNo} as bookcolumnno from member where activityYN='Y'
mapper.select: select * from recordbooks_value order by split_part(bookcolumnno,'-',1)::numeric asc,split_part(bookcolumnno,'-',2)::numeric asc ,split_part(bookcolumnno,'-',3)::numeric asc,userno asc
mapper.insert: insert into recordbooks_value(bookno,userno,bookcolumnno) select bookno,#{userNo},bookcolumnno from recordbooks_column
mapper.select: select(select count(*) from recordbooks_value where bookno='1' and bookcolumnno=#{bookColumnNo} and (value is null or value='출석')) as attend, (select count(*) from recordbooks_value where bookno='1' and bookcolumnno=#{bookColumnNo} and value='지각') as late, (select count(*) from recordbooks_value where bookno='1' and bookcolumnno=#{bookColumnNo} and value='결석') as absence from recordbooks_value limit 1
